src.clustering package¶

Submodules¶

src.clustering.cluster_mappings module¶

Cool docstring.

src.clustering.cluster_mappings.aggregate_cluster(points, labels)¶

Arranges all clusters in a list, where a sublist with all points at index i corresponds with the custer with label i.

Parameters:
  • points (list) – List of datapoints
  • labels (list) – List of unique cluster labels
Returns:

list of lists of datapoints belonging to the i-th cluster
Return type:

list
